## ä¿®æ­£ç‰ˆãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆä¾‹

```javascript
await item.locator(".item-content").click({ force: true });
await page.keyboard.type("1234567890abcdefghij");
await page.keyboard.press("Enter");
await page.keyboard.type("ABCDEFGHIJklmnopqrst");
await page.keyboard.press("Enter");
await page.keyboard.type("ZYXWVUTSRQPONMLKJIHG");

// ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆãŒåæ˜ ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‹ç¢ºèª
const text = await item.locator(".item-text").textContent();
expect(text).toContain("ZYXWVUTSRQPONMLKJIHG");

// è¡Œé«˜ã‚’å–å¾—
const rect = await item.locator(".item-content").evaluate(el => el.getBoundingClientRect());
const lineHeight = 24; // ä¾‹: 1è¡Œã®é«˜ã•ï¼ˆpxï¼‰ã‚’ä»®å®šã€‚å¿…è¦ã«å¿œã˜ã¦èª¿æ•´

const positions = [
    // 1è¡Œç›®ä¸­å¤®
    { x: rect.left + rect.width / 2, y: rect.top + lineHeight * 0.5 },
    // 2è¡Œç›®ä¸­å¤®
    { x: rect.left + rect.width / 2, y: rect.top + lineHeight * 1.5 },
    // 3è¡Œç›®ä¸­å¤®
    { x: rect.left + rect.width / 2, y: rect.top + lineHeight * 2.5 },
];

for (const { x, y } of positions) {
    await page.keyboard.press("Escape");
    await item.locator(".item-content").click();
    await page.mouse.click(x, y);
    await page.waitForSelector(".editor-overlay .cursor.active", { state: "attached" });
    const cursorBox = await page.locator(".editor-overlay .cursor.active").boundingBox();
    expect(cursorBox).not.toBeNull();
    const delta = 10;
    expect(Math.abs(cursorBox!.x - x)).toBeLessThan(delta);
    expect(Math.abs(cursorBox!.y - y)).toBeLessThan(lineHeight); // è¡Œé«˜ã®èª¤å·®ã‚’è¨±å®¹
}
```

- yåº§æ¨™ã¯ `rect.top + lineHeight * (è¡Œç•ªå· + 0.5)` ã§ä¸­å¤®ã‚’ç‹™ã†
- `lineHeight` ã¯å®Ÿéš›ã®CSSå€¤ã«åˆã‚ã›ã¦èª¿æ•´ï¼ˆä¾‹: 24pxï¼‰

_**Assistant**_

ã¯ã„ã€**line heightï¼ˆè¡Œã®é«˜ã•ï¼‰ã¯å®Ÿéš›ã®DOMè¦ç´ ã‹ã‚‰å–å¾—ã§ãã¾ã™**ã€‚

### å–å¾—æ–¹æ³•

ä¾‹ãˆã°ã€Svelte/Playwrightã®ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆå†…ã§\
`.item-text` ã® `getBoundingClientRect()` ã§é«˜ã•ã‚’å–å¾—ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

```javascript
const lineHeight = await item.locator(".item-text").evaluate(el => {
    // ç©ºã§ãªã‘ã‚Œã°1è¡Œç›®ã®é«˜ã•
    if (el.firstChild && el.firstChild.nodeType === Node.TEXT_NODE) {
        const range = document.createRange();
        range.setStart(el.firstChild, 0);
        range.setEnd(el.firstChild, 1);
        return range.getBoundingClientRect().height;
    }
    // ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒãƒƒã‚¯: è¦ç´ å…¨ä½“ã®é«˜ã•
    return el.getBoundingClientRect().height;
});
```

**è¤‡æ•°è¡Œã®å ´åˆ**ã¯ã€å„è¡Œã®yåº§æ¨™ã‚’`Range`ã§å–å¾—ã—ã¦å·®åˆ†ã‚’å–ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§ã€\
ã€Œå®Ÿéš›ã®è¡Œé«˜ã€ã‚„ã€Œå„è¡Œã®yåº§æ¨™ã€ã‚‚å–å¾—ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

### æ±ç”¨çš„ãªãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆä¾‹ï¼ˆã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ãƒ»é€šå¸¸ã‚¢ã‚¤ãƒ†ãƒ ä¸¡å¯¾å¿œï¼‰

```javascript
// 1. ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯å¯¾è±¡ã®itemã‚’å–å¾—

await item.locator(".item-content").click({ force: true });

// 2. ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’è¤‡æ•°è¡Œå…¥åŠ›
await page.keyboard.type("line1");
await page.keyboard.press("Enter");
await page.keyboard.type("line2");
await page.keyboard.press("Enter");
await page.keyboard.type("line3");

// 3. å„è¡Œã®yåº§æ¨™ã‚’å–å¾—
const lineYs = await item.locator(".item-text").evaluate(el => {
    const lines = [];
    const text = el.textContent || "";
    let start = 0;
    for (let i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
        const range = document.createRange();
        range.setStart(el.firstChild, start);
        range.setEnd(el.firstChild, start + 5); // "line1"ãªã©5æ–‡å­—
        const rect = range.getBoundingClientRect();
        lines.push(rect.top + rect.height / 2); // è¡Œã®ä¸­å¤®y
        start += 6; // 5æ–‡å­—+æ”¹è¡Œ
    }
    return lines;
});

// 4. å„è¡Œä¸­å¤®ã‚’ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã—ã¦ã‚«ãƒ¼ã‚½ãƒ«ä½ç½®ã‚’æ¤œè¨¼
for (const y of lineYs) {
    const rect = await item.locator(".item-content").evaluate(el => el.getBoundingClientRect());
    const x = rect.left + rect.width / 2;
    await page.keyboard.press("Escape");
    await item.locator(".item-content").click();
    await page.mouse.click(x, y);
    await page.waitForSelector(".editor-overlay .cursor.active", { state: "attached" });
    const cursorBox = await page.locator(".editor-overlay .cursor.active").boundingBox();
    expect(cursorBox).not.toBeNull();
    expect(Math.abs(cursorBox!.x - x)).toBeLessThan(10);
    expect(Math.abs(cursorBox!.y - y)).toBeLessThan(10);
}
```
